Title: Niko Neko Pureya
Description: Niko Neko Pureya is a simple media player designed for people who watch a series of videos (anime, drama etc). Since my main concern was an easy to use media player, I created AniPlayer X in VB.NET and later on ported the code to Niko Neko Pureya in C# using Microsoft's WMP ActiveX Control. It's very simple to use and it looks moderately good. And hopes that you'll enjoy it as well ^_^
HomeWiki:
Niko Neko Pureya has been superseded by Baka MPlayer

Baka MPlayer is the new mplayer2 based media player that I am working on and it uses a lot less memory and cpu cycles than Niko Neko Pureya.

Totally rewritten for speed and efficiency, you should seriously check it out!

Main Website: http://bakamplayer.netii.net/

Git: https://github.com/godly-devotion/Baka-MPlayer

Niko Neko Pureya Description

Niko Neko Pureya is a simple media player designed for people who watch a series of videos (anime, drama etc). Since my main concern was an easy to use media player, I created AniPlayer X in VB.NET and later on ported the code to Niko Neko Pureya in C# using Microsoft's WMP ActiveX Control. It's very simple to use and it looks moderately good. And hopes that you'll enjoy it as well ^_^
